thread.title: ITPS Appoints Bunner as Chief Financial Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: ITPS Appoints Bunner as Chief Financial Officer
text:
PITTSBURGH, Feb. 14, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Information Technology Procurement Sourcing (ITPS) a leading provider of IT managed services, products and technology, is excited to announce the appointment of P. Daniel Bunner as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer (CFO), reporting to ITPS CEO, Eric Cunningham.
Mr. Bunner is a senior-level leader with a broad-based, applied knowledge from more than twenty years of corporate accounting and finance experience on matters related to (i) strategic plan development and execution, (ii) profitability and cash flow optimization, and (iii) and overall financial management. Additionally, Mr. Bunner has the proven ability to lead accounting and financial management by setting objectives and deciding courses of action to allow for an improvement in operations, increased profits and better asset management.
As CFO, Mr. Bunner will be responsible for the financial and capital management strategies, budgeting and planning, accounting and treasury for all ITPS companies including, ELEVATE K-12, LEFCON, BluChip and Receptio."
"I am excited to join ITPS at such a pivotal period for the Company," said Bunner. "ITPS is uniquely positioned for significant growth with its diverse mix of businesses across the commercial segment, hospitality, K-12, and higher education verticles. With a range of offerings from fully managed services to targeting consulting with specific clients, the company differentiates itself based on the collective knowledge and experiences of the team. All in all, I'm most excited to be working with Eric, who I've known for many years, and the team that he has formed."

"Dan's experience & leadership has significantly changed the way ITPS manages all financial aspects. With many different revenue models, Dan has simplified a very complex business model for what is approaching to be 300 clients across the board.
